articles.title: SA Jewish Board slams SA Rugby's withdrawal of Israeli team from new competition - News24
articles.description: The South African Jewish Board on Monday released a statement slamming SA Rugby's decision to withdraw an invitation to an Israeli rugby team to play in the country.
